data.eml:eml: The tribe Dysoniini part IV: New species of Quiva Hebard, 1927 (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Phaneropterinae) from Brazilian rainforest and some clarifications

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cadena-Castañeda, Oscar J., Mendes, Diego Matheus De Mello, Da Silva Sovano, Rafael S. (2015): The tribe Dysoniini part IV: New species of Quiva Hebard, 1927 (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Phaneropterinae) from Brazilian rainforest and some clarifications. Zootaxa 3972 (1): 75-84, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3972.1.5
